Abstract: Ray Hubbard, television producer and broadcasting executive, dies at age of 75 (M)
Snippet: Ray Hubbard, television producer and broadcasting executive, dies at age of 75 (M)
LeadParagraph: Ray Hubbard, a television producer and broadcasting executive and a pioneer in the medium, died on Monday in Kenwood, Calif. He was 75 and had been suffering from Parkinson's disease.

Headline.Main: Ray Hubbard, 75, Executive And Pioneer in Broadcasting
Headline.PrintHeadline: Ray Hubbard, 75, Executive And Pioneer in Broadcasting
